languages.text: "Бойцы! С нами Вольный Торговец, а значит, и сам Император! Все, кто может держать оружие — на передовую!"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Гвардейцы, вольный торговец с нами, оставшимся боеспособным солдатам командую привести себя в порядок и идти в атаку!

languages.text: "Soldiers! The Rogue Trader is with us, and therefore the Emperor Himself! Everyone who can hold a weapon — to the front line!"
languages.original_text: "Бойцы! С нами Вольный Торговец, а значит, и сам Император! Все, кто может держать оружие — на передовую!"

traits.locale_text: "Soldiers! The Rogue Trader is with us, and therefore the Emperor Himself! Everyone who can hold a weapon — to the front line!"
"Soldiers! The Rogue Trader is with us, and therefore the Emperor Himself! Everyone who can hold a weapon — to the front line!"
"Soldiers! The Rogue Trader is with us, and therefore the Emperor Himself! Everyone who can hold a weapon — to the front line!"
"Soldiers! The Rogue Trader is with us, and therefore the Emperor Himself! Everyone who can hold a weapon — to the front line!"
"Soldiers! The Rogue Trader is with us, and therefore the Emperor Himself! Everyone who can hold a weapon — to the front line!"

languages.text: “士兵们！行商浪人与我们同在，因此帝皇本人也与我们同在！所有还能拿得起武器的人，都给我上前线去！”
languages.original_text: "Soldiers! The Rogue Trader is with us, and therefore the Emperor Himself! Everyone who can hold a weapon — to the front line!"

traits.locale_text: “士兵们！行商浪人与我们同在，因此帝皇本人也与我们同在！所有还能拿得起武器的人，都给我上前线去！”

languages.text: «¡Soldados! {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente nos acompaña, ¡y por lo tanto el Emperador también! ¡Que todo el que pueda empuñar un arma avance al frente!».
languages.original_text: "Soldiers! The Rogue Trader is with us, and therefore the Emperor Himself! Everyone who can hold a weapon — to the front line!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Soldados! {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente nos acompaña, ¡y por lo tanto el Emperador también! ¡Que todo el que pueda empuñar un arma avance al frente!».

languages.text: 「諸君！自由開拓者、そして皇帝も我々と共にある！武器を持てるものは―前線へ向かうのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Soldiers! The Rogue Trader is with us, and therefore the Emperor Himself! Everyone who can hold a weapon — to the front line!"

traits.locale_text: 「諸君！自由開拓者、そして皇帝も我々と共にある！武器を持てるものは―前線へ向かうのだ！」

languages.text: "Soldaten! {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist bei uns und damit der Imperator selbst! Alle, die eine Waffe halten können – an die Front!"
languages.original_text: "Soldiers! The Rogue Trader is with us, and therefore the Emperor Himself! Everyone who can hold a weapon — to the front line!"

traits.locale_text: "Soldaten! {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist bei uns und damit der Imperator selbst! Alle, die eine Waffe halten können – an die Front!"

languages.text: « Soldats ! {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} est avec nous, et par conséquent, l'Empereur en personne ! Que tous ceux qui peuvent porter une arme gagnent les premières lignes ! »
languages.original_text: "Soldiers! The Rogue Trader is with us, and therefore the Emperor Himself! Everyone who can hold a weapon — to the front line!"

traits.locale_text: « Soldats ! {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} est avec nous, et par conséquent, l'Empereur en personne ! Que tous ceux qui peuvent porter une arme gagnent les premières lignes ! »

languages.text: "Asker! Hür Tacir bizim yanımızda, bu da demek oluyor ki İmparator Hazretleri de bizzat bizim yanımızdadır! Eli silah tutan herkes ön cepheye!"
languages.original_text: "Soldiers! The Rogue Trader is with us, and therefore the Emperor Himself! Everyone who can hold a weapon — to the front line!"

traits.locale_text: "Askerler! Hür Tacir bizim yanımızda, bu da demek oluyor ki İmparator da bizzat bizim yanımızda! Eli silah tutan herkes ön cepheye!"
